languages.text: "Большинство пустотнорожденных — представители крупных корабельных династий, которые отвечают за определенный аспект жизни корабля. Династия Толиман, например, вот уже три сотни лет неизменно взращивает и обучает Мастеров вокса из потомков основной ветви семьи. А большинство наших подчиненных — выходцы побочных ветвей династии".

traits.locale_text: "Большинство пустотников — представители крупных корабельных династий, которые отвечают за определенный аспект жизни корабля. Династия фон Толеман, например, вот уже три сотни лет неизменно взращивает и обучает Мастеров Вокса из потомков основной ветви семьи. А большинство наших подчиненных — выходцы побочных ветвей династии".

languages.text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Большинство пустотнорожденных — представители крупных корабельных династий, которые отвечают за определенный аспект жизни корабля. Династия Толиман, например, вот уже три сотни лет неизменно взращивает и обучает Мастеров вокса из потомков основной ветви семьи. А большинство наших подчиненных — выходцы побочных ветвей династии".

traits.locale_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large dynasties that dwell aboard the vessel and bear responsibility for a certain aspect of her life. The von Toleman dynasty, for instance, has been raising Vox Masters from among the scions of the main branch of the family. Most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

"Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

"Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

"Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

languages.text: «Muchos de los nacidos en el vacío somos miembros de grandes dinastías que se responsabilizan de un aspecto concreto de la vida a bordo. Durante tres siglos, la rama principal de la dinastía Toliman ha producido a los maestros de voco de esta nave, mientras que la mayoría de nuestros subordinados provienen de nuestras casas cadete».
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Muchos de los nacidos en el vacío somos miembros de grandes dinastías que se responsabilizan de un aspecto concreto de la vida a bordo. Durante tres siglos, la rama principal de la dinastía Toliman ha producido a los maestros de voco de esta nave, mientras que la mayoría de nuestros subordinados provienen de nuestras casas cadete».

languages.text: “绝大部分虚空之子都是大型虚空舰王朝的成员，专门负责飞船生活的某个方面。这三百年来，这艘飞船的历任音阵大师都来自托里曼王朝的主要分支，而我们的绝大部分下属，都来自这个王朝的下属家族。”
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “绝大部分虚空之子都是大型虚空舰王朝的成员，专门负责飞船生活的某个方面。这三百年来，这艘飞船的历任音阵大师都来自托里曼王朝的主要分支，而我们的绝大部分下属，都来自这个王朝的下属家族。”

languages.text: 「多くの虚空生まれは大きなヴォイドシップ王朝の一員であり、船の生活のあらゆる面で役割を担います。300年間、トリマン王朝の主な分家が船のヴォクスマスターを輩出してきました。それに私達の部下のほとんどが分家出身です」
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「多くの虚空生まれは大きなヴォイドシップ王朝の一員であり、船の生活のあらゆる面で役割を担います。300年間、トリマン王朝の主な分家が船のヴォクスマスターを輩出してきました。それに私達の部下のほとんどが分家出身です」

languages.text: "Die meisten Kinder der Leere sind Mitglieder großer Raumschiffdynastien, die die Verantwortung für einen bestimmten Aspekt des Lebens eines Schiffs tragen. Seit dreihundert Jahren stellt der Hauptzweig der Dynastie Toliman die Voxmeister des Schiffs. Und die meisten unserer Untergebenen stammen aus den Kadettenhäusern der Dynastie."
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Die meistern Kinder der Leere sind Mitglieder großer Raumschiffdynastien, die die Verantwortung für einen bestimmten Aspekt des Lebens eines Schiffs tragen. Seit dreihundert Jahren stellt der Hauptzweig der Dynastie Toliman die Voxmeister des Schiffs. Und die meisten unserer Untergebenen stammen aus den Kadettenhäusern der Dynastie."

languages.text: « La plupart des hors-monde appartiennent à de grandes dynasties qui ont chacune la responsabilité d'un certain aspect de la vie du vaisseau. Depuis trois cents ans, la branche principale des Toliman engendre nos maîtres-vox, et la plupart de nos subordonnés sont issus des maisons subalternes de notre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « La plupart des hors-monde appartiennent à de grandes dynasties qui ont chacune la responsabilité d'un certain aspect de la vie du vaisseau. Depuis trois cents ans, la branche principale des Toliman engendre nos maîtres-vox, et la plupart de nos subordonnés sont issus des maisons subalternes de notre dynastie. »

languages.text: "Uçsuzdoğanların çoğu, gemideki yaşamın belli taraflarından sorumlu olan büyük uçsuz gemisi hanedanlıklarından birine mensuptur. Geminin Voks Üstatları, üç yüz yıldır Toliman hanedanlığının ana soyundan çıkmaktadır. Astlarımızın çoğu da hanedanlık bünyesindeki ailelerden gelmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Most of the voidborn are members of large voidship dynasties that bear responsibility for a certain aspect of the ship's life. For three hundred years, the main branch of the Toliman dynasty has produced the ship's Vox Masters. And most of our subordinates come from the cadet houses of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Uçsuzdoğanların çoğu, gemideki yaşamın belli taraflarından sorumlu büyük uçsuz gemisi hanedanlıklarından birine mensuptur. Geminin Voks Üstatları, üç yüz yıldır Toliman hanedanlığının ana soyundan çıkmaktadır ve astlarımızdan çoğu da hanedanlığın kanatlarının altındaki hanelerden gelmektedir."
